hints_latex: Check your notes for the definition.
hints_raw: Check your notes for the definition.
question: 4 (a)
sols_html:
We say that n is a pseudoprime to the base b if n is a composite integer and

\(\displaystyle b^{n} \equiv b \mod{n}\).
sols_raw:
We say that ''n'' is a pseudoprime to the base ''b'' if ''n'' is a composite integer and 

<math> \displaystyle b^{n} \equiv b \mod{n}</math>.
statement_html: Let b be a positive integer. Explain what a pseudoprime to the base b is.
statement_latex:
Let \emph{b} be a positive integer. Explain what a pseudoprime to the
base \emph{b} is.
statement_raw: Let ''b'' be a positive integer. Explain what a pseudoprime to the base ''b'' is.
